definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: break in pieces: Pf. 3 fs. [[הַדֶּ֫קֶת]] Da 2:34, Da 2:45, 3 mpl.[[הַדִָּקוּ]] Da 6:25 (all sq. acc.); Impf. 3 fs. [[תַּדִּק]] Da 2:40 (abs.), v:Da 2:44 (acc.); sf. [[תַּדֱּקִנַּהּ]] Da 7:23; Pt. act. [[מְהַדֵּק]] Da 2:40 (acc.), f. [[מַדֱּקָה]] (K:§ 46, 3 b)) abs. Da 7:7, Da 7:19.
